duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and review corporate, partnership and individual tax returns
Prepare and review financial statement compilations and reviews
Serve as primary contact for clients, working directly with them to help them meet their goals
Help business owners grow and enhance the value of their companies
Supervise, manage and schedule client engagements, bringing work to point of completion in accordance with deadlines and budgets
Train and mentor senior accountants and other staff

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Successful completion of the CPA exam, Minimum 7 years of relevant public accounting experience in tax, Committed to professional development and willingness to contribute to the growth of the firm
